title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.26 - Compliance with more current standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-3.26 - Compliance with more current standards

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary in this
title, a licensed operator or applicant, when submitting a construction project
application for approval, may elect to comply with all applicable requirements
of Subpart 713-4 of this Part in lieu of complying with this

Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
713-3.26

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
